classification_data.text: LA SUSCRITA CONTADORA PÚBLICA DE QUIMEL INGENIERIA S.A.S. CERTIFICA QUE: A la fecha de expedición de la presente certificación, QUIMEL INGENIERIA S.A.S., identificada con el NIT No. 901.108.357-8, tiene un capital autorizado, suscrito y pagado de QUINIENTOS VEINTE MILLONES DE PESOS ($520.000.000.00), dividido en 5.200 acciones de valor nominal de $100.000 cada una con la siguiente participación: IDENTIFICACIÓN NOMBRE ACCIONISTAS NO. DE ACCIONES % PARTICIPACIÓN VALOR NOMINAL POR ACCIÓN $100.000 NACIONALIDAD DE LOS SOCIOS C.E 737708 MENDOZA CARRANZA JOSE CARLOS 5.200 100% 520.000.000 SALVADOREÑO TOTAL 5.200 100% 520.000.000 SANDRA MILENA BOLAÑOS BRAVO T.P 158280-T C.C 27.191.211 CONTADORA JOSE CARLOS MENDOZA CARRANZA C.E 737708 REPRESENTANTE LEGAL El presente certificado se expide a los 30 días del mes de Diciembre de 2022.

content.thinking: Let's follow the classification workflow to analyze this document: 1. **TEXT EXTRACTION** The document appears to be a certification issued by an accountant for a company called QUIMEL INGENIERIA S.A.S. It details the company's share capital structure and ownership. 2. **PRIORITY CHECKS** - BLANK: This document is not blank as it contains substantial content. - LINK_ONLY: This document is not primarily hyperlinks/URLs. 3. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION** - This document is issued by the accountant of QUIMEL INGENIERIA S.A.S. (not DIAN or Chamber of Commerce) - It's signed by SANDRA MILENA BOLAÑOS BRAVO (Accountant) and JOSE CARLOS MENDOZA CARRANZA (Legal Representative) 4. **DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS** The document serves to certify the ownership structure and shareholding composition of QUIMEL INGENIERIA S.A.S. It details: - Capital authorization: $520,000,000.00 - Share structure: 5,200 shares with a nominal value of $100,000 each - Shareholder information: JOSE CARLOS MENDOZA CARRANZA with 100% ownership (all 5,200 shares) - The document includes ownership percentages and share values 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** Let's evaluate systematically: - CECRL: This is not a personal identification document. - RUT: This is not a tax registration document from DIAN. - CERL: This is not a Certificate of Existence and Legal Representation from a Chamber of Commerce. - ACC: This appears to match the ACC category: - Contains shareholder terminology ("ACCIONISTAS") - Includes ownership percentages (100%) - Shows number of shares (5,200) - Specifies share values ($100,000 per share, total $520,000,000) - Identifies the owner (JOSE CARLOS MENDOZA CARRANZA) - Is certified by a legal representative and accountant - RUB: This is not a beneficial ownership report from DIAN. 6. **CONFIDENCE VALIDATION** The document strongly matches the ACC category criteria: - Clear focus on share ownership structure - Includes ownership percentages (100%) - Contains a structured list of shareholders (in this case, one shareholder with complete ownership) - Includes certification by the company's accountant and legal representative Based on this analysis, I classify this document as ACC (Documents that certify the ownership structure and shareholding composition of a company). DE ACCIONES % PARTICIPACIÓN VALOR NOMINAL POR ACCIÓN $100.000 NACIONALIDAD DE LOS SOCIOS C.E 737708 MENDOZA CARRANZA JOSE CARLOS 5.200 100% 520.000.000 SALVADOREÑO TOTAL 5.200 100% 520.000.000 SANDRA MILENA BOLAÑOS BRAVO T.P 158280-T C.C 27.191.211 CONTADORA JOSE CARLOS MENDOZA CARRANZA C.E 737708 REPRESENTANTE LEGAL El presente certificado se expide a los 30 días del mes de Diciembre de 2022."
